snippet: Three more executives of Barclays — its global head of mergers, its chairman of investment banking and its Asia-Pacific head — are expected to leave, the latest in a series of exits by high-profile bankers from the British firm.
abstract: Three more executives of Barclays — its global head of mergers, its chairman of investment banking and its Asia-Pacific head — are expected to leave, the latest in a series of exits by high-profile bankers from the British firm.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: More Senior Departures Expected From Barclays in Upheaval at British Firm
headline.print_headline: More Senior Executives Expected to Leave Barclays
